main.description: A declaration of an audio recording

name.description: A short name for the audio recording

description.description: A description of the audio recording

audioBlob.description: The blob of the audio recording

metadata.description: The metadata of the audio recording

createdAt.description: The date and time of the creation of the record

codec.description: The codec of the audio recording

format.description: The format of the audio recording

channels.description: The number of channels of the audio recording

duration.description: The duration of the audio recording in seconds

recordedAt.description: The date and time of the recording

sampleRate.description: The sample rate of the audio recording

coordinates.description: The coordinates at which the audio was recorded in the format 'latitude,longitude' OR 'latitude,longitude,altitude'
